text:
When given the asymptotes and vertices, find the equation of the hyperbola

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Asymptotes } y=\frac{5}{3} x, y=\frac{-5}{3} x \\\n\text { Vertices }(0,5)(0,-5)\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Asymptotes } y=\frac{5}{3} x, y=\frac{-5}{3} x [/imath] [imath]\text { Vertices }(0,5)(0,-5)[/imath]
